epic.title: Python Project Setup
epic.description: Initial Python project setup and configuration.

tasks.title: Configure Python virtual environment
tasks.description:
## Context
Project needs isolated Python environment.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create virtual environment (uv or venv)
- [ ] Install dev dependencies
- [ ] Document activation in README

## Acceptance Criteria
- `uv sync` or `pip install -e .[dev]` works

tasks.title: Set up pytest testing
tasks.description:
## Context
Project needs automated testing.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create tests/ directory
- [ ] Add conftest.py with fixtures
- [ ] Write first passing test
- [ ] Configure coverage

## Acceptance Criteria
- `pytest` runs and passes

tasks.title: Configure linting and formatting
tasks.description:
## Context
Consistent code style improves readability.

## Tasks
- [ ] Configure ruff in pyproject.toml
- [ ] Add pre-commit hooks
- [ ] Document linting commands

## Acceptance Criteria
- `ruff check .` passes
- `ruff format .` works

tasks.title: Add type checking
tasks.description:
## Context
Type hints catch bugs early.

## Tasks
- [ ] Configure mypy in pyproject.toml
- [ ] Add py.typed marker
- [ ] Fix any type errors

## Acceptance Criteria
- `mypy .` passes
